org.asoem.greyfish.core.io

Class BufferedJDBCLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.core.io.BufferedJDBCLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, JDBCLogger, SimulationLogger

    @ThreadSafe
public final class BufferedJDBCLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements JDBCLogger
    A SimulationLogger which logs to a JDBC Connection. This implementation uses a Disruptor to handle the incoming events and therefore is threadsafe.
